Bug_report.description: LogIn button is not responsive at the logIn page
Bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce: 1.Fill out the 'first name' plaseholder with valid data
2.Fill out the 'last name name' plaseholder with valid data
Bug_report.Expected_result: user navigates to the main page
Bug_report.Actual_result: user stays on the login page
Bug_report.Enviroment: os - Windows11, browses - Chrome Version 102.0.5005.61 (Official Build) (64-bit)
